info.name: like dislikes bar hider for YouTube
info.description: a like dislikes bar hider for YouTube

style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("youtube.com") { #watch7-views-info { opacity: 0; transition: 0.1s ease-in-out;} #watch7-views-info:hover { opacity: 1;} }
